agentCard.name: Financial Verification Agent Factory Agent
agentCard.description: Financial AI Verification Agent Factory - generates specialized financial verification agents using all 7 core agent factories (core, RAG, citation, web_search, consistency, medical, legal) for regulatory-compliant financial AI validation with transaction verification, risk assessment, fraud detection, compliance checking, market data validation, financial statement analysis, and audit trail generation
